creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
(Copied from first part of Bug 26986)

A problem with 1.2RC2 on Windows 2000:

I had these problems with the exported static site of the default 
publication in G:\Lenya12
\build\lenya\webapp\lenya\pubs\default\work\export\pending\default\live\

1. the path to the css file is absolute and not 
correct: "/default/live/css/page.css"

2. The png-picture is not used because the path is 
absolute and not correct: "file:///G:/default/live/images/project-logo.png"

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
Bug 25545 has been resolved as fixed.

Maybe this one now also can be resolved.

text: I will test the status of this bug.
